Operation 'get_/autocomplete_suggestions' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Description lacks clarity about required input parameters (search term) and what the response structure contains. AI agents need to understand that a search term is required and what type of suggestions are returned (terms vs attributes). Enhanced description clarifies inputs, outputs, and use case.

data.current_summary: Get list of suggested terms and attributes similar to the search term
data.current_description:
Lists the suggested terms and attributes similar to the search term.

For more information, check the Intelligent Search [Autocomplete](https://help.vtex.com/en/tracks/vtex-intelligent-search--19wrbB7nEQcmwzDPl1l4Cb/4gXFsEWjF7QF7UtI2GAvhL) guide.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [authentication](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/authentication) or [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Returns autocomplete suggestions including both search terms and product attributes matching the provided search term. Accepts a search query as input and returns a list of suggested terms and their associated attributes to help users refine their search. This endpoint supports the autocomplete feature by providing contextual suggestions based on the shopper's input.
data.reasoning: Description lacks clarity about required input parameters (search term) and what the response structure contains. AI agents need to understand that a search term is required and what type of suggestions are returned (terms vs attributes). Enhanced description clarifies inputs, outputs, and use case.

message: Operation 'get_/correction_search' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary uses awkward phrasing ('Get attempt of correction'). Description lacks input/output clarity and doesn't explain what happens when corrections are found or not found. Enhanced version clarifies the action (retrieve corrections), inputs (misspelled term), outputs (corrected suggestions), and use case for AI agents.

data.current_summary: Get attempt of correction of a misspelled term
data.current_description:
Tries to correct a misspelled term from the search.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [authentication](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/authentication) or [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve spelling correction for search term
data.description_suggestion: Attempts to correct misspelled search terms and returns suggested corrections. Accepts a misspelled search query as input and returns corrected term suggestions if available. This endpoint helps improve search results by automatically detecting and correcting common spelling errors in user queries.
data.reasoning: Original summary uses awkward phrasing ('Get attempt of correction'). Description lacks input/output clarity and doesn't explain what happens when corrections are found or not found. Enhanced version clarifies the action (retrieve corrections), inputs (misspelled term), outputs (corrected suggestions), and use case for AI agents.

message: Operation 'get_/banners/{facets}' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Description doesn't clarify what inputs are required (search query, facets) or what banner data is returned. The {facets} path parameter is not explained. AI agents need to understand that facets are optional filters and what banner properties are included in responses. Enhanced description clarifies inputs, outputs, and the banner feature's purpose.

data.current_summary: Get list of banners registered for query
data.current_description:
Lists the banners registered for a given query. Check the [configuring banners documentation](https://help.vtex.com/en/tracks/vtex-intelligent-search--19wrbB7nEQcmwzDPl1l4Cb/4ViKEivLJtJsvpaW0aqIQ5) for a full explanation of the banner feature.

## Permissions

 This endpoint does not require [authentication](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/authentication) or [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves promotional banners configured for a specific search query and facet filters. Accepts a search query and optional facet parameters to return matching banners. Returns a list of banner objects containing promotional content, images, and links configured to display for the given search context. Banners are marketing assets that enhance the product list page experience.
data.reasoning: Description doesn't clarify what inputs are required (search query, facets) or what banner data is returned. The {facets} path parameter is not explained. AI agents need to understand that facets are optional filters and what banner properties are included in responses. Enhanced description clarifies inputs, outputs, and the banner feature's purpose.

message: Operation 'get_/search_suggestions' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Description is too minimal and doesn't explain required inputs or response structure. AI agents need to understand the distinction between this endpoint and autocomplete_suggestions (terms only vs terms+attributes). Enhanced description clarifies inputs, outputs, and differentiates this operation from related autocomplete functionality.

data.current_summary: Get list of suggested terms similar to the search term
data.current_description:
Lists suggested terms similar to the search term.

For more information, check the Intelligent Search [Autocomplete](https://help.vtex.com/en/tracks/vtex-intelligent-search--19wrbB7nEQcmwzDPl1l4Cb/4gXFsEWjF7QF7UtI2GAvhL) guide.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [authentication](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/authentication) or [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Returns search term suggestions similar to the provided search input. Accepts a search term as input and returns a list of alternative or related search terms to help users discover relevant searches. Unlike autocomplete_suggestions, this endpoint focuses exclusively on search terms without product attributes, supporting the autocomplete feature for query refinement.
data.reasoning: Description is too minimal and doesn't explain required inputs or response structure. AI agents need to understand the distinction between this endpoint and autocomplete_suggestions (terms only vs terms+attributes). Enhanced description clarifies inputs, outputs, and differentiates this operation from related autocomplete functionality.

message: Operation 'get_/product_search/{facets}' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Description is too vague about inputs and outputs. With 12 parameters, AI agents need to understand what parameters are available (sorting, pagination, filters). Current description doesn't mention pagination, sorting, or filtering capabilities. Enhanced version clarifies that this is the primary product search endpoint, explains key input categories, and describes the product data returned.

data.current_summary: Get list of products for a query
data.current_description:
Lists the active products for a given query.

## Permissions 

This endpoint does not require [authentication](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/authentication) or [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.summary_suggestion: Search and retrieve active products matching query
data.description_suggestion: Searches the product catalog and returns active products matching the provided search query and optional facet filters. Accepts a search term, facets, sorting, pagination, and filtering parameters to customize results. Returns a list of product objects with details including name, price, images, and availability. Supports pagination and sorting to handle large result sets efficiently.
data.reasoning: Description is too vague about inputs and outputs. With 12 parameters, AI agents need to understand what parameters are available (sorting, pagination, filters). Current description doesn't mention pagination, sorting, or filtering capabilities. Enhanced version clarifies that this is the primary product search endpoint, explains key input categories, and describes the product data returned.

message: Operation 'get_/facets/{facets}' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Description lacks context about what facets are and what data is returned. AI agents need to understand that facets are filters, what information each facet contains (names, values, counts), and how they're used for search refinement. Enhanced description explains the facet concept, clarifies inputs/outputs, and describes the facet data structure.

data.current_summary: Get list of the possible facets for a given query
data.current_description:
Lists the possible facets for a given query.

## Permissions 

This endpoint does not require [authentication](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/authentication) or [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves available facets (filters) for a given search query to enable product list page filtering. Accepts a search query and optional facet parameters as input and returns a list of facet objects containing filter names, values, and counts. Each facet represents a filterable product attribute (e.g., brand, price range, color) with the number of products matching each value, enabling users to refine search results.
data.reasoning: Description lacks context about what facets are and what data is returned. AI agents need to understand that facets are filters, what information each facet contains (names, values, counts), and how they're used for search refinement. Enhanced description explains the facet concept, clarifies inputs/outputs, and describes the facet data structure.
